availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Served as Assistant Surgeon to the Tenth Kentucky Cavalry from September 10, 1862 until September 17, 1863. Surgeon of the Forty-Fifth Regiment Kentucky Infantry. Enrolled on November 14, 1863 in Cincinnati, Ohio. Honorably discharged in December 24, 1964.

ab.bibl:
Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 2, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1866), 443, 934, 935.
Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 1, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1866), 250.
